text: tatha ve aapase maasik dharm ke vishay mein prashn karate hain. to kah den ki vah maleenata hai aur unake sameep bhee na[1] jao, jab tak pavitr na ho jaayen. phir jab ve bhalee bhaanti svachchh[2] ho jaayen, to unake paas usee prakaar jao, jaise allaah ne tumhen aadesh[3] diya hai. nishchay allaah tauba karane vaalon tatha pavitr rahane vaalon se prem karata hai
